title: JSW group not withdrawing Rs 40,000 cr EV project from Odisha: Company official
description: The JSW group has confirmed it is not withdrawing its Rs 40,000 crore electric vehicle and battery project from Odisha. Despite media reports suggesting a shift to Maharashtra, the company remains committed to its plans in Odisha, including an EV manufacturing plant and a lithium refinery.
